Title: Object: La vierge aux perdrix
Series: Galerie Impériale de l'Ermitage
Description: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt; the Holy Family at left with the Virgin holding up Christ, while a chorus of angels sing and dance to entertain them, pheasants in top right; after Anthony van Dyck. c.1845-1847 Lithograph on chine collé
Curator's comments: After the painting by Anthony van Dyck and Cornelis de Vos in the Hermitage, St Petersburg; another version is in the Palazzo Pitti, Florence. See 1859,1008.128 for comment on series.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (3) (Huot)
